com.accenture.citrus.bookstore.validation

Class XmlSchemaValidatingChannelInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.messaging.support.ChannelInterceptorAdapter
      • com.accenture.citrus.bookstore.validation.XmlSchemaValidatingChannelInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.messaging.support.ChannelInterceptor

    public class XmlSchemaValidatingChannelInterceptor
extends org.springframework.messaging.support.ChannelInterceptorAdapter
    Class is used as XML schema validating channel intercepter Channel intercepter validating incoming messages with a given XSD Schema resource. In case of validation errors the intercepter raises a XmlValidationException. The exception can be handled by an exception resolver for transforming into proper SOAP faults for example.
    Author:
    vijay.venkatappa
